CustomField.description: Tracks total length of delivery time based on working days
CustomField.formula: (Completed_Date__c - Requested_Date__c ) - ( FLOOR ( ( ( (Completed_Date__c) - Requested_Date__c ) / 7 ) ) * 2 ) + CASE(MOD ( Requested_Date__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7), 0,CASE( MOD ((Completed_Date__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,1,2 ), 1,CASE( MOD ((Completed_Date__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7),0,2,1 ), IF(MOD( Requested_Date__c - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) - MOD((Completed_Date__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) <= 0 ,0, IF(MOD((Completed_Date__c) - DATE( 1900,1,6 ),7) = 0,1,-2 ) ))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Automated field that calculates length of delivery based on working days
CustomField.label: Length of Delivery
